metadata.Title: CVE-2019-10019 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Xpdf 4.01.01. There is an FPE in the function PSOutputDev::checkPageSlice at PSOutputDev.cc for nStripes.

notes.Note: jdstrand> xpdf in koffice is 2.0 ebarretto> xpdf in Debian uses poppler, which is not affected or fixed

criterions.comment: poppler: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
xpdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
